mapper.select: SELECT leave_history_code, leave_category_sort, leave_category_code, leave_history_grant_hour, leave_history_grant_day, leave_history_used_hour, leave_history_used_day, leave_history_remaining_hour, leave_history_remaining_day FROM leave_history WHERE member_id = #{memberID} ORDER BY(SUBSTRING_INDEX(leave_category_code,'_',-1)+0)

SELECT m.member_id FROM department d INNER JOIN member m
ON d.department_name = m.department_division_name
ON d.department_name = m.department_section_name
ON d.department_name = m.department_category_name
WHERE d.department_name = #{departmentName}
